channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [removed] Secure Gateway (securegateway)
item.description: IBM Secure Gateway for IBM Cloud enables users to integrate cloud services with enterprise systems on premises.

item.title: [removed] Dizzion Complete (dizzion-complete)
item.description: Leverage the power of virtual desktops and apps on IBM Cloud VPC in a fully turnkey approach - managed and hosted by Dizzion.

item.title: [removed] Dizzion Complete - Horizon (dizzion-complete-horizon)
item.description: Leverage the power of Horizon virtual desktops and apps on IBM Cloud Bare Metal - fully managed and hosted by Dizzion.

item.title: [removed] Dizzion Complete FS - Horizon (dizzion-digitalworkspaces-complete)
item.description: Managed DaaS on IBM Cloud for Financial Services.

item.title: [removed] Dizzion Flex (dizzion-flex)
item.description: Simply and intuitively deploy and manage virtual desktops and apps on IBM Cloud VPC.

item.title: [removed] Dizzion Managed (dizzion-managed)
item.description: Leverage the power of virtual desktops and apps on IBM Cloud VPC without needing to reallocate or reskill your IT resources.

item.title: [removed] Hyper Protect Virtual Server for Classic (hpvs)
item.description: You are recommended to create the latest Hyper Protect Virtual Servers for VPC at https://cloud.ibm.com/vpc-ext/provision/vs?architecture=s390x&secureExecution=true. For more information, click the "About" tab.

item.title: [updated] watsonx Orchestrate (watsonx-orchestrate) has removed the plan named premium-agentic-messages
